channel.title: Strings storing data [PI] Rep++

item.title: Strings storing data [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Basically I want to make my yell command and with it I want a few different if statements
As you can see. I get no errors, although uwhen I yell from any username it and it yells “[]Kalvin” or the username
If anyone can help me fix so that anyone in the sdev string gets the string title of sdev? I’ll rep++

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String title = “”;
String sDev[] = { “Kalvin2”, “Kalvin” };
for (String x : sDev) {
if (c.playerName.equals(x))
title = “Server Dev”;

else if(!(c.playerName.equals(x))){
switch(c.playerRights) {
case 0:
title = “Mod”; //The title for ‘playerRights’ of 0
break;
case 1:
title = “Player”; //The title for ‘playerRights’ of 1
break;
case 2:
title = “Test”; //The title for ‘playerRights’ of 2
break;
case 3:
title = “wooww”; //The title for ‘playerRights’ of 3
break;
}
}
}
for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
if (p != null) {
Client all = (Client) p;
all.sendMessage("[" + title + "] " + c.properName + “:” + playerCommand.substring(5));
}
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
